channel.title: Technology on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Technology on FinanClub

item.title: PINS
item.description: score:157 Chances: Pinterest is seeing a growing partnership with Amazon and strengthening advertising business, making it a standout stock for 2024, according to RBC. RBC Capital Markets analysts upgraded Pinterest to Outperform from Sector Perform and raised their price target on the stock, citing the company’s potential to benefit from impulse purchases and increased body representation on its platform.

item.title: AUR
item.description: score:99 Chances: Aurora Innovation, Inc. has shown strong progress towards commercial launch with an Autonomy Readiness Measure (ARM) of 84% in Q3 2023. The company has announced the opening of the industry’s first lane for driverless trucks supported by commercial-ready terminals in Dallas and Houston, which could signify significant growth potential.
